attributes.action: Fix the date of election so that it is the same date every four years
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I want to fix the date of election so that it is on the same date every four years. I do not feel that it is in the interest of democracy for the controlling party to choose when it stands, it gives unfair advantage and I believe promotes short-term policy and views within government.
